projects.title: Careship
projects.description: Careship is a non-violent variation of the popular game battleship. I used TDD (with Jest) the first time for the Careship game. To separate the view from the logic The PubSub pattern is used. I learned a lot about the drag and drop API as well as doing drag and drop with mouse events.

projects.title: Todo App
projects.description: I learned a lot about SOLID principles doing this Odin bootcamp project. I love to be organized (GTD rocks!). That is why with a friend developer I build an extended todo app - with Firebase background structure, and more functionality. We also created an UML diagramm for optimizing the architecture.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: This project helped me to firm my understanding of APIs and asynchronous functions. With this weather app you can search for any city worldwide and get the current climate dates and appropriate weather icons.

recommendations.title: Richard Steinmetz, Software Engineer at Devex
recommendations.text: I've worked with David in different situations and settings and I must say that he is a remarkable engineer, learner and human being. Having pair programmed with him on a real-world challenge, I can tell that he really quickly gets into understanding the task at hand. He keeps an open mindset and guides the process with great thoughtful questions, even being new to a domain or technology! As David's coach I'm always amazed about his persistence and drive to solve problems and learn new things. He tackles every task conscientiously and with dedication. And while in the process, he never misses an opportunity to take active part in improving communication processes and give actionable honest feedback to make anything that you are working on another tad better. It's a real pleasure to work together with David and you'd be immensily happy to have him on board!
